metadata.title: CVE-2017-9053 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue, also known as DW201703-005, was discovered in libdwarf 2017-03-21. A heap-based buffer over-read in _dwarf_read_loc_expr_op() is due to a failure to check a pointer for being in bounds (in a few places in this function).

criterions.comment: dwarfutils package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '20180129-1').
